title: Notification Profile
description:
NotificationProfileSpec defines the desired state of NotificationProfile.
NotificationProfile configures how and when to send notifications about StreamingJob
lifecycle events through various notification services (Slack, Email, Webhook, etc.).

configMapRef.description:
ConfigMapRef references a ConfigMap containing notification triggers, templates, and service configurations.
The ConfigMap should contain keys like:
- trigger.<name>: YAML trigger definitions with conditions and templates
- template.<name>: Go template definitions for notification messages
- service.<name>: Service-specific configuration (Slack, Email, Webhook, etc.)

Example ConfigMap structure:
  data:
    trigger.job-failed: |
      - when: job.status.phase == 'Failed'
        send: [job-failure-alert]
    template.job-failure-alert: |
      message: Job {{.job.metadata.name}} failed: {{.job.status.errorMessage}}
    service.slack: |
      token: $slack-token

context.description:
Context provides additional variables available to notification templates.
These key-value pairs are added to the template context as {{.context.<key>}}.
Common uses: operatorUrl, clusterName, environment, region

Example:
  context:
    operatorUrl: "https://veloxpack.example.com"
    environment: "production"
    clusterName: "prod-us-west-2"

defaultDestinations.description:
DefaultDestinations defines default notification destinations that apply to all triggers.
These destinations receive notifications for any triggered event unless overridden
by annotation-based subscriptions on individual StreamingJobs.

Example:
  defaultDestinations:
    - service: slack
      recipients: ["#production-alerts", "#ops-team"]
    - service: email
      recipients: ["alerts@example.com"]

items.description: NotificationDestination defines a notification service and its recipients

recipients.description:
Recipients is a list of destination identifiers for this service.
For Slack: channel names like "#alerts" or user IDs
For Email: email addresses
For Webhook: typically not needed (webhook URL is in service config)
For PagerDuty: routing keys or service keys

service.description:
Service is the name of the notification service (e.g., "slack", "email", "webhook")
Must match a service configured in the ConfigMap

defaultTriggers.description:
DefaultTriggers is a list of triggers that are enabled by default for all notifications.
If specified, these triggers will be automatically evaluated unless explicitly disabled.
Common values: ["job-failed", "job-succeeded"]

secretRef.description:
SecretRef references a Secret containing sensitive notification service credentials.
Keys should match variables referenced in service configurations (e.g., $slack-token).
The Secret must be in the same namespace as the NotificationProfile.

Example Secret:
  data:
    slack-token: <base64-encoded-token>
    email-password: <base64-encoded-password>
